name: Tres-Bashers
description:
Tres-Bashers is a 2D monster-bashing adventure featuring a big interconnected map full of cryptids, secrets, and more! Find 40 different monster types and whack 'em with your baseball bat!CONTENTS 40 monster types, including jersey devils, apparitions, and cassowaries.
Move set upgrades including back flip, wall climb, and double jump!
Collectible bestiary profiles for each monster (lore!)
6 formidable (and monstrous) bosses!
a catchy 50+ song 2a03/NES chiptune soundtrack, written to fit the spooky atmosphere!
Alternate weapons in the shops, if you don't prefer a bat!
Branching paths allowing for non-linear approaches in repeat playthroughs.FEATURES Tight, responsive (fully bindable) controls. (XInput & DirectInput support)
Vsync, fullscreen and window scale options.
Way too many save files!
